description: Guame the Immoveable is one of the Spiral King`s Four Supreme Generals, who specialises in ground combat. His appearance is like that of a crocodile and armadillo and the oldest of the four generals, revealed in the parallel works to be originally an animal-like figure seen by Lordgenome`s side as a parallel to Boota, living as long as or almost as long as the Spiral King has.
name: Guame
